Entries.SeedShop_Entry: Oh, it's really pouring out there

Entries.Caroline: #$c .7#I hope the sun comes out soon. What did the weather report say today?#A good cup of tea is excellent on a day like this. Here. I've got an extra.[614]

Entries.9{{YearRemainder}}: Gosh, @, I was up way too late last night trying to balance the books.#$b#Apologies if I don't feel like chatting.
Entries.11{{YearRemainder}}: Think I might order some new tea...Let's see, what have I not had recently?
